rules.name: Yes_there_is_a_MP_seller
rules.label: Yes there is a MP seller

Flow.description: adding seller opp to purchase process

formulas.name: AllInputsValid
formulas.expression: AND( CONTAINS({!CollectionInputOfferCreate}, '"selectedYacht":{"label":"'), CONTAINS({!CollectionInputOfferCreate}, '"selectedYacht":{"label":"'), LEN( MID( {!CollectionInputOfferCreate}, FIND('"selectedYacht":{"label":"', {!CollectionInputOfferCreate}) + FIND('"value":"', MID( {!CollectionInputOfferCreate}, FIND('"selectedYacht":{"label":"', {!CollectionInputOfferCreate}), 200 ) ) + 7, 18 ) ) = 18 )

formulas.name: GetCurrencyByLabel
formulas.expression: MID( {!CollectionInputOfferCreate}, FIND('"label":"', {!CollectionInputOfferCreate}, FIND('"currency":', {!CollectionInputOfferCreate})) + 9, FIND('"', {!CollectionInputOfferCreate}, FIND('"label":"', {!CollectionInputOfferCreate}, FIND('"currency":', {!CollectionInputOfferCreate})) + 9) - (FIND('"label":"', {!CollectionInputOfferCreate}, FIND('"currency":', {!CollectionInputOfferCreate})) + 9) )

formulas.name: GetOfferPriceByLabel
formulas.expression: VALUE( MID( {!CreateOfferPrice}, FIND('"offerPrice":"', {!CreateOfferPrice}) + 14, FIND('"', MID({!CreateOfferPrice}, FIND('"offerPrice":"', {!CreateOfferPrice}) + 14, 50)) - 1 ) )

formulas.name: TrueKYCEmpty
formulas.expression: AND( AND( ISBLANK({!OfferTable.firstSelectedRow.Selling_Broker__c}), ISBLANK({!OfferTable.firstSelectedRow.Sale_Opportunity__c}) ), OR( {!OfferUpdateHeaderControll.outputValue} = "Add Agreed", {!AddBrokerController.outputValue} = "Add Agreed" ), ISBLANK({!KYCOpportunity.Id}) )

Flow.label: OfferScreenOnOpp.

recordUpdates.name: Update_Opp_Value_field_if_blank
recordUpdates.label: Update Opp Value field if blank

textTemplates.text: [ { "label": "Error", "name": "Error", "type": "Display text", "value": " Please Add Selling Broker First" },
